thread.title: Myanmar’s Aung San Suu Kyi Visits Rakhine in Bid for Ethnic Minority Vote
thread.title_full: Myanmar’s Aung San Suu Kyi Visits Rakhine in Bid for Ethnic Minority Vote - WSJ

author: Shibani Mahtani
title: Myanmar’s Aung San Suu Kyi Visits Rakhine in Bid for Ethnic Minority Vote
text:
TAUNGOK, Myanmar—A trip to the tense Rakhine state this week has put one of opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi’s hardest tasks ahead into view: winning over enough votes from ethnic minorities to grant her party a decisive victory in November’s elections.
The area near Myanmar’s border with Bangladesh still bears the scars of sectarian riots in 2012 when ethnic-Rakhine Buddhists clashed with Rohingya Muslims, many of whom are now confined to squalid camps along with other Muslim minorities. Ms. Suu Kyi’s arrival on Friday...
